title: Chuck Schumer announces timeline for Trump impeachment
description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer announces details for the impeachment trial against former President Donald Trump with the start of arguments to begin February 9, giving the Senate time to confirm President Joe Biden's Cabinet.

title: Race to vaccinate US before more contagious Covid-19 strains spread
description: CNN's Nick Watt reports on the long waits around the US for coronavirus vaccinations due to dwindling supply.

title: Biden's foreign diplomacy blitz begins
description: President Joe Biden had been inside the White House for only two hours on Wednesday before finding an opportunity to recall one of his many intimate meals with a foreign leader who, now they are both presidents, can officially be called a counterpart.

title: Former QAnon follower: It's like a doomsday cult
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar speaks with Jitarth Jadeja, who followed QAnon for two years, about how it appeals to its members and what happens now that "The Storm" never came.

title: Former Trump official who backs Biden stimulus plan speaks out
description: Former Trump Economic Adviser Kevin Hassett tells CNN's Brianna Keilar why he supports President Biden's $1.9 trillion economic stimulus plan.

title: SE Cupp says controversial GOP lawmaker is 'wasting time with pointless impeachment stunt'
description: CNN political commentator SE Cupp explains how Rep. Marjorie Taylor Green (R-GA) and fellow Republicans who believe in and spread conspiracy theories are part of former President Donald Trump's legacy.

title: Ever receive a package you didn't order? It could be a scam
description: Third-party sellers on Amazon and other e-commerce sites are sending random products to people across the US as part of what's known as a "brushing scam" -- a bizarre scheme that helps boost a vendors' ratings online. Here's how it works.

title: UK coronavirus variant may be deadlier, officials say
NFL surprises health care workers with Super Bowl tickets
description: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell joined a web call with hospital workers to surprise them with tickets to Super Bowl LV.

title: Fossil-hunters think they have found the lair of a giant, predatory, prehistoric worm
description: Scientists think they have discovered the undersea lair of a giant predatory worm that lived on the ocean floor some 20 million years ago and would pounce on unsuspecting marine creatures.

title: The $7,000 Air Jordans that had Inauguration Twitter abuzz
description: Whether it was the significance of the transition of power, Amanda Gorman's poem, the famous faces in the crowd or the barrage of Bernie Sanders memes, the inauguration of US President Joe Biden wasn't short of talking points.

title: New Netflix movie 'The Dig' and more recommendations if you love ancient history
description: Caches of unopened sarcophagi found in Egypt. Eight miles of Ice Age rock paintings discovered in the Amazon rainforest. An intricate Roman mosaic floor excavated in northern Italy. These are just some of the major archaeological finds of the past year.

title: Staggering number of wild bee species unaccounted for since the '90s
description: There has been an overwhelming drop in the number of wild bee species that are reported in public records over the past 30 years, according to a new study.

title: Why Republicans are still in charge of some key Senate proceedings as Schumer and McConnell work out power-sharing
Biden focuses on the economy on Day 2 in office
Capitol Police investigating after congressman discovered carrying a gun when attempting to go on the House floor
description: US Capitol Police are investigating an incident in which a Republican lawmaker was stopped from bringing a concealed gun onto the House floor on Thursday, sources told CNN, the first time a member of Congress has been discovered with a firearm by the metal detectors now set up outside the legislative chamber.

title: Biden doubles down on executive orders
'The White Tiger' presents a searing look at India's caste system
description: "The White Tiger" is one of those movies that would likely struggle to claw out much attention without Netflix's muscle behind it, underscoring the streaming service's ability to lead people to worthwhile films they might not see -- in this case, a sobering adaptation of Aravind Adiga's award-winning book that dissects India's caste system.

title: Dave Chappelle asymptomatic after testing positive for Covid-19
description: Comedian Dave Chappelle has tested positive for Covid-19 but is asymptomatic, according to a statement from his representative obtained by the Hollywood Reporter.

title: Google threatens to shut down search in Australia
description: Google says it will shut down its search engine in Australia if a controversial bill designed to benefit the news media becomes law.

title: America's Great Lakes just set a record for lack of ice
description: Most years, by January the majority of the Great Lakes are so cold they look like a scene from "Frozen." This year, that's not the case.

title: Biden doubles down on executive orders
description:
• Dr. Fauci addresses shortcomings of Trump admin's handling of Covid-19
• Fauci offers a glimmer of hope for the fall
• Analysis: Biden is so far as good as his word

title: Fauci says lack of candor from Trump administration 'very likely' cost lives
Putin presents a Russia-sized foreign-policy headache for Biden
Nigerian teen jailed for blasphemy has sentence quashed
description: A Nigerian teen who was convicted in the northwest of the country of blasphemy has had his sentence overturned, his lawyer said Friday.

title: Fact check: Biden falsely claims journalists had all said his vaccination goal was impossible to meet
description: President Joe Biden delivered a factually accurate Thursday speech about the coronavirus pandemic. But then, after he signed a series of executive actions intended to address the crisis, he was asked by a reporter whether the vaccination goal he announced in December -- 100 million doses administered in 100 days -- is sufficiently ambitious.

title: France passes law protecting the 'sensory heritage' of its countryside
description: France has passed a law protecting the "sensory heritage" of its rural areas, in the face of complaints about the noises and smells typical of the countryside.

title: Fauci: Lack of candor from Trump administration 'very likely' cost lives
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci said Friday that the lack of truthfulness from the Trump administration regarding the Covid-19 pandemic "very likely" cost American lives.

title: This couple married for 70 years were scheduled to get the Covid-19 vaccine, but died from the virus before their appointment
description: Childhood sweethearts who were inseparable during their 70 years of marriage died of Covid-19 while holding hands in an Ohio hospital, their family told CNN.

title: 'Fat but fit' is a myth when it comes to heart health, new study shows
Amanda Gorman reminded America what poetry can do
description: It is no secret what poetry can do. What Black poetry can do.

title: Why Russian-backed mercenaries are digging a huge trench in Libya
description: Construction on an enormous trench across Libya, dug by Russian-backed mercenaries Wagner, is raising fears that foreign fighters will not withdraw from the country by Saturday, as a UN-brokered peace deal insists.

title: Two tech stalwarts fail to impress Wall Street
description: Tech companies have been an investor favorite during the pandemic. But Wall Street is keeping its distance from two industry stalwarts after their latest earnings reports.

title: Russia, a country with a nuclear arsenal rivaling that of the US, can't simply be placed in the penalty box
description: • Analysis: Pompeo's Xinjiang 'genocide' declaration hands Biden a China challenge

title: Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner move out of DC and lease luxury condo in Miami
Fauci reflects on why previous admin fell short on Covid-19 strategy
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci explains the Biden administration's approach to addressing the coronavirus pandemic and how this will differ from the Trump administration's handling of the virus.

title: The place that helped inspire American democracy
description: You'll find it almost everywhere you turn -- on T-shirts, bumper stickers, magnets and all types of tourist trinkets -- the three words: "Ithaca is gorges."

title: LeBron James says 'it would be great' for LA Lakers to visit the White House, should Covid-19 protocols allow
description: LeBron James has opened up the possibility of the LA Lakers visiting the White House in order to celebrate last year's NBA championship -- if only Covid-19 protocols would allow it.

title: Mick Norcross, 'The Only Way Is Essex' star, found dead at 57
description: British reality TV star Mick Norcross has been found dead at his home at the age of 57.

title: Alphabet is shutting down Loon, its ambitious internet balloon venture
description: A futuristic project by Google's parent company Alphabet to provide internet from high flying balloons has burst.

title: Liverpool's shock defeat to Burnley ends 68-game unbeaten run at Anfield
description: Liverpool lost its first Premier League home game in almost four years as relegation-threatened Burnley pulled off a stunning upset to end Jurgen Klopp's 68-game unbeaten run at Anfield.

title: Tropical Cyclone Eloise strengthens before imminent Mozambique landfall
description: Tropical Cyclone Eloise is taking advantage of warm ocean waters as it strengthens before making landfall in Mozambique. CNN meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the updates.

title: 'Extreme heat wave conditions' expected in Australia
description: A remnant tropical cyclone and a separate high pressure system are setting the stage for oppressive heat this weekend into early next week. CNN meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the updates.

title: Man charged with scamming nearly $1M from grocery store
description: A Georgia man was arrested and charged with scamming almost $1 million from a grocery store and using it to buy clothes, guns and cars, police said.

title: Rescue operation to free miners trapped underground for nearly 2 weeks could take another 15 days
description: Chinese officials say it could day 15 days to drill through 70 tons of debris to reach miners trapped underground for nearly two weeks after an explosion at a gold mine in eastern China.

title: Damning report criticizes world's response to Covid-19
description: The world responded to the coronavirus pandemic with a series of global failures, according to an independent panel established by the World Health Organization. A damning interim report from the panel highlights how too many countries and institutions were slow to act and take the threat seriously. CNN's Cyril Vanier reports.

title: How late-night TV reacted to Biden's first full day in office
description: Late-night hosts Jimmy Fallon, Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah joke about President Joe Biden's first full day in office.

title: 'The Simpsons' seemed to get it right again -- by predicting part of the inauguration
description: First things first: No, "The Simpsons" cannot actually predict the future.

title: South Korean former Olympic skating coach jailed for 10 years over abuse
description: A former Olympic speed skating coach has been jailed for 10 years by a South Korean court for sexual abuse.

title: Blaze at facility of world's biggest vaccine maker kills 5
description: • LIVE UPDATES Real Madrid manager Zinedine Zidane tests positive for Covid-19

title: Pompeo's Xinjiang 'genocide' declaration presents Biden with an early China challenge
description: As Joe Biden prepared to be sworn in as United States President on Wednesday, both the outgoing Trump administration and Beijing made a last-minute play to shape his future China policy -- and provide the first major foreign policy challenge of his term.

title: 'Go back to where you came from': Cricket fan details allegations of racial abuse by staff and supporters
description: Krishna Kumar had long dreamed of watching the Indian cricket team play in Australia. But when that dream materialized at the Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG) earlier this month, the experience, he says, was belittling.

title: 'Do you feel you were duped?': CNN anchor presses Republican lawmaker
description: CNN's Erin Burnett presses Rep. Nicole Malliotakis (R-NY) about her pledge to work with the Biden administration despite questioning the results of the 2020 presidential election.

title: Bernie Sanders sports 'grumpy chic' style at inauguration
description: Bernie Sanders' mittens leave viewers smitten. Check out the best memes. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.
